Class Gacha

java.lang.Object
Gacha
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Gacha extends Object implements Serializable
A gacha is a system that randomly gives items to the player. This system is used to randomly give items to the player.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Gacha

      public Gacha(Inventory inventory)
      Creates a new gacha system. A gacha is a system that randomly gives items to the player.

      To add items to this gacha, insert an item object into the gacha using the addItem method. This will create the item with the initial gacha chance of 0.

      To roll the gacha, use the rollGacha method. This method will return a random item from the gacha. The item will be inserted into the inventory specified in the rollGacha method.

      Parameters:
      inventory - the inventory to insert the item into

  • Method Details

    • addNewItem

      public void addNewItem(Item i, int gachaChance)
      Adds an item to the gacha with a specified gacha chance. If an item with the same name already exists, it will replace the original item.
      Parameters:
      i - the item to add
      gachaChance - the gacha chance of the item

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(String itemName)
      Deletes an item from the gacha by its name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the item does not exist in the gacha

    • updateItemGachaChance

      public void updateItemGachaChance(String itemName, int gachaChance)
      Updates the gacha chance of an item by its name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to update
      gachaChance - the new gacha chance of the item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the item does not exist in the gacha

    • rollGacha

      public Item rollGacha()
      Rolls the gacha and returns a random item. The item is selected based on the gacha chances of all items. The item is inserted into the inventory.

      You should probably use this method with a condition (e.g. if coin > 0)

      Returns:
      the item object obtained from the gacha roll

    • getGachaItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getGachaItems()
      Gets the list of all items in the gacha.
      Returns:
      the list of all items in the gacha

    • getGachaChance

      public int getGachaChance(String itemName)
      Finds an item by its name and returns its gacha chance.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to search for
      Returns:
      the gacha chance of the item if found, or -1 if the item is not found

    • getTotalGachaChance

      public int getTotalGachaChance()
      Gets the total gacha chance of all items.
      Returns:
      the total gacha chance of all items
